channel.title: Go Make Things
channel.description: Vanilla JavaScript for beginners and designers.

item.title: My First Post 3
item.description: Here it is! var something = 'things'; document.querySelector('#chickens').addEventListener('click', function (event) { event.preventDefault(); }, false); heading 1 heading 2 heading 3 content a b c d e f
item.content:encoded:
Here it is!

var something = 'things';
document.querySelector('#chickens').addEventListener('click', function (event) {
	event.preventDefault();
}, false);
heading 1 heading 2 heading 3
content a b c
d e f
